alert.note: Alert for Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 11:05PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Colorado, Wharton, southeastern Austin, Jackson, southwestern Fort Bend and northwestern Matagorda Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1105 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kendleton to near El Campo to 8 miles northeast of Salem. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Bay City, El Campo, Wharton, Edna, East Bernard, Ganado, Kendleton, La Ward, Pierce, Boling-Iago, Lolita, Van Vleck, Cordele, Egypt, Louise, Midfield, Hungerford, Nada, Morales and Lake Texana Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton
